features: PINK PEARL HAND SOAP - Our refreshing hand soap is made of a luxurious and gentle cleansing formula that will leave your hands feeling soft and clean. The hand wash removes everyday germs from your skin, sanitising your hands to leave them hygienically clean. Sold in an easy-to-use 5-Litre bottle, the soap is perfect for use in a variety of environments. (2 Pack of 5-Litre Bottles)

DAILY USE - Mild enough for general use on a regular basis, the pink pearl soap has both refreshing and moisturising qualities, hydrating the skin to restore its natural balance. The soap forms a rich lather with a fresh floral fragrance, giving your hands a pleasant refreshing scent. Ideal for both dry and sensitive skin.

BULK HAND SOAP REFILL - The 5L hand soap bottle is ideal to use for refilling small dispensers. With 2x 5-Litre bottles, you can be confident that you won't run out anytime soon. This cost saving bulk hand wash pack is ideal for long term use. Simply store in a dry space and use when needed.

IDEAL FOR WASHROOMS - Designed for a variety of environments, this bulk hand soap is an ideal buy for both homes and businesses. It is perfect for use in washrooms, schools, restaurants, sports clubs, hotels, offices and more, keeping everyone fresh and sanitised.

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY PACKAGING - Made from biodegradable material, our pink pearl hand soap bottles consist of 30% recycled plastic. All of our bottles are made in the UK for a reduced carbon impact.
